content: I have been and bearing the burden of unemployment for a long time. Although I tried hard for a job, I could not get a good job. This life of unemployment was so unbearable to me that words cannot express it. One day I met one of my friends suddenly. My friend saw my helpless condition and told me about this bitcoin forum. The whole way he was saying it was unbelievable to me. Later, with the help of my friend, I continued to devote time to this Bitcoin forum. With the help of the members of this forum I achieved full member status. Then I joined a campaign from where I got $40 bitcoins in a week. Unfortunately, the campaign stopped for a week. Then I was transferring to sell bitcoins because of low transfer fee my bitcoins were stuck for about 12 to 14 days. Back then I thought earning from Bitcoin was incredible. But yesterday all my thoughts changed as Bitcoin was successfully deposited in my wallet. I have successfully sold bitcoins in my native currency. Earnings from bitcoin forums today I have no more negative ideas about bitcoin forums.

I don't see much of a member rank campaign these days. I was so excited that I even created a thread for it. I gained a lot of advice from reputable members, and one of the advice was that I should not relent; I should just keep on pushing and I will get to where I am looking soon. And very soon, the earning I celebrated will be something little to me as I will be earning more as I grow. I wish to see you celebrate more things in the future.
